title: Govt spending, revenue combo to reduce deficit

content.question: Country X has a budget deficit. Which of the following changes in government budget outlays and tax revenues will result in a decrease in Country Xâ€™s government budget deficit?

choices.label: Government OutlaysTax RevenuesFall by $100 millionFall by $600 million
Government OutlaysTax RevenuesFall by $200 millionFall by $200 million
Government OutlaysTax RevenuesRise by $300 millionFall by $300 million
Government OutlaysTax RevenuesRise by $400 millionRise by $600 million
Government OutlaysTax RevenuesRise by $500 millionRise by $500 million

content.answer: Government OutlaysTax RevenuesRise by $400 millionRise by $600 million

topic.text: 5.4: Government Deficits and the National Debt

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
